channel.title: Disclaimer on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Disclaimer on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Gravity and Roma director Alfonso Cuar√≥n’s latest project, Disclaimer, is a fascinating and at times uncomfortable drama about a woman accused of being heartless in her past. Oscar winning actress Cate Blanchett steps up to play the aloof Catherine Ravenscroft who finds her perfect life falling apart with the publication of a book. Kevin Kline plays a former teacher who relishes the chance to teach her a lesson. The Apple TV+ series is a riveting story that unfolds chapter by chapter, like a novel.
